title: Why don't more cars have a center-mounted seat? - Quora

response.answer_text: More Cars ? It is not a good use of the interior space, or do you mean in newer cars that all have bucket seats and a console, generally with the shift lever in it ? If your thinking of newer cars they would not fit three in front as did the older cars which were much wider.

The answer is popularity and practicality. Automakers survey owners and the public what they like and dislike about their cars or cars in general and take the responses and do their to make people happy and sell cars
